title: [Updated] Scheduled Minor Patch - August 10, 2023
content: We will be performing a scheduled minor patch on Thursday, August 10, 2023 at 6:30 AM PDT (9:30 AM EDT / 3:30 PM CEST / 11:30 PM AEST).

title: Scheduled Minor Patch - August 10, 2023
content: We will be performing a scheduled minor patch on Thursday, August 10, 2023 at 6:30 AM PDT (9:30 AM EDT / 3:30 PM CEST / 11:30 PM AEST).

title: [Updated] Investigation of Jett Job Advancement to Explorer Issues
content: We are currently investigating the issues linked to the Jett Job Advancement to Explorer event.

title: Cash Shop Update for August 2
content: Wisp's Wondrous Wonderberry, Summer Surprise Style Box, Gachapon Update, and more!

title: [Updated] Maple Memo: Update on NA Reboot Server Instability
content: We share an update regarding the compensation for recent server issues.

title: [Completed] Scheduled Minor Patch - July 27, 2023
content: The maintenance has been completed and we have extended Cash Shop items for 6 hours. Please restart your Nexon Launcher or Steam to make sure that you get the latest client! Thank you for your patience.

title: Scheduled Maintenance - August 3, 2023
content: We are currently performing an scheduled maintenance on Thursday, August 3, 2023 at 7:00 AM PDT (10:00 AM EDT / 4:00 PM CEST / 12:00 AM AEST Aug. 4).

title: Cash Shop Update for July 26
content: Legend of the Blue Sea Package, White Sand Beach Package, Sunset Beach Package, and more!

title: Miracle Summer - July 29 - Gloves
content: This Saturday, July 29, 2023, Maplers on all Worlds will have Miracle Time enabled for Gloves!

title: [Updated] Investigation on NA Reboot Server Issues - July 20, 2023
content: We're currently investigating the rollback that occurred during the server issues on July 20, 2023.
